mapper.select: select distinct o.ord_code ord_code, acc_code, acc_name,to_char(ord_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as ord_date,to_char(ord_due_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as ord_due_date,ord_progress, e.emp_name emp_name,ord_note from bns_order_detail d join bns_order o on(d.ord_code =o.ord_code) join com_info_emp e on(o.emp_num = e.emp_num) order by ord_code
